    Minjong Ha

    I am a system software engineer working at the Tmax. I am interested in the system architecture, memory management, non-volatile memory, and virtualization.

    • Email
    • Github

    About me

    Experience

    • 2022.01 - Present : Research & Develop / TmaxOS
      • Research and develop ‘TmaxGooroom SD’ based on Gooroom OS
        • Improve and optimize VM performance with the para-virtualization
        • Research and implement Host-Guest communication
        • Deploy VM image version management infrastructure based on the oVirt
        • Implement VM image restoration

    • 2020.03 - 2022.02 : Graduate Research Assistant / System Software Lab, Ajou University

    • 2018.11 - 2020.02 : Research Intern / System Software Lab, Ajou University

    • 2018.12 - 2019.02 : Intern - iOS Application / KidSoft
      • Develop and publish ‘iChak’ iOS application
        • Seat checking system for the children with the BLE device
        • Implement the interactions between the application and bluetooth seat cushion

    Tools

    • Programming Language
      • C
      • C++
      • Python
      • (Optional) Swift

    Education

    • 2020.03 - 2022.02: M.S. in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence / Ajou University, Korea
      • Advisor: Professor Sang-Hoon Kim (Ajou University, Korea)
      • Thesis: Research on Operating System-Level Approaches for Large Scale Address Space with Persistent Memory
      • System Sofware Lab
    • 2013.03 - 2020.02: B.S. in Software Engineering and Computer Science / Ajou University, Korea
      • Graduation Work: Fit-Got-U: Smartphone Home-Fitness Application with Pose Estimation

    Journals

    • CCoW: Optimizing Copy-on-Write Considering the Spatial Locality in Workloads
      • Minjong Ha, and Sang-Hoon Kim*
      • MDPI Electronics, Vol. 11, Issue 3, No. 461, February 2022
    • InK: In-Kernel Key-Value Storage with Persistent Memory
      • Minjong Ha, and Sang-Hoon Kim*.
      • MDPI Electronics, Vol. 9, Issue 11, No. 1913, November 2020

    Patents

    • Copy-on-Write Optimization Apparatus and Method for Process Fork
      • Sang-Hoon Kim and Minjong Ha
      • Patent Filed No. 10-2020-0187135 (December 30, 2020), Korea
